title: South Arican server
body: It is impossible to play with 200 ping. please, We need an south African server. Or a continental server. There are so many South African's than would love this and so many more would join the LOL community.

replies.body: Does it really matter on what board I post? I just want South African players to be seen. Really love this game, but connection problems are blocking so many skilled South African players from perfoming. Don't even know why I am posting this. I know rito does not really give a f*ck about South African players. Hopefully someday rito will change their minds

Since you're making a suggestion rather than looking for help or support, this post would fit better on the [**Miscellaneous Boards.**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous)

Let me know if you have any questions.
